content:
2nd International Workshop on Artificial Intelligence in Software Testing Co-located with ICST 2022
AIST will be virtual AIST will be held online on the 4th of April, 2022. The program can be found here.
Important Dates Abstract Submission: 20 January 2022 AoE Submission deadline: 27 January 2022 AoE Notification of Acceptance: 17 February 2022 Camera-ready: 24 February 2022 Paper Submission Papers are to be submitted via EasyChair in the following link:
https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=aist22 See Call for Papers for more details.
summary:

title: AIST 2022
